lead_paragraph: Twitter Inc has signed a major livestreaming deal with its first Asian partner, Globe Telecom Inc of the Philippines, for its two exclusive U.S. National Basketball Association shows, the companies said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Twitter Signs Philippines Ad Deal for NBA Livestream Shows
headline.main: Twitter Signs Philippines Ad Deal for NBA Livestream Shows

snippet: Twitter Inc has signed a major livestreaming deal with its first Asian partner, Globe Telecom Inc of the Philippines, for its two exclusive U.S. National Basketball Association shows, the companies said on Thursday....
